Question: Paru Printed Electronics Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
PARU Printed Electronics

INKO Products at CES 2024

- Demonstrating latest INKO products and film heater technologies for home appliances, healthcare, and automotive
- Showcased heating solutions such as FlexOn, UltraOn, SoftOn at CES 2024
- Features UltraOn with applications in closet steam, dishwasher, hot wafer washing, and semiconductor wafer heating
- Specializes in printed electronics technology for flexible substrates using conductive ink
- Eco-friendly and economical heating solutions with printed film heaters
- High-efficiency energy components for printed electronics
- Exhibited at CES 2024, booth number #52949
- Contact email: jwkang@parupe.com
Summary_cn:
PARU印刷电子产品

INKO 产品展示CES 2024

- 展示家用电器、医疗保健和汽车领域的最新INKO产品和薄膜加热技术
- 在CES 2024展示FlexOn，UltraOn，SoftOn等加热解决方案
- UltraOn适用于壁橱蒸汽、洗碗机、热波浪烫和半导体晶圆加热等应用
- 专注于使用导电墨水的柔性基板的印刷电子技术
- 使用印刷薄膜加热器的环保且经济的加热解决方案
- 用于印刷电子的高效能组件
- 在CES 2024参展，展位号为#52949
- 联系电子邮件：jwkang@parupe.com
